name: VBS Message (Sendkeys) Creator
short_description:
For those of you who are too lazy to type 5 lines of code to trick your friends, family, or whoever else you don't mind getting yelled at, I've typed 607 for you...
This batch file makes it quick and easy to create a VBS (Visual Basic Script) that inputs the letters/numbers/symbols that you choose at an interval that you choose. You have the option of it automatically placing it in the startup folder too.
To close the script, open "Task Manager", navigate to the "Processes" tab, find the process "wscript.exe", select it, and hit "End Process".
